mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usuario (idRol, idEmpresa, nombre, apellidoPaterno, apellidoMaterno, CURP, email, username, password) VALUES (#{idRol}, #{idEmpresa}, #{nombre}, #{apellidoPaterno}, #{apellidoMaterno}, #{CURP}, #{email}, #{username}, #{password})
mapper.update: UPDATE usuario SET idRol = #{idRol}, idEmpresa = #{idEmpresa}, nombre = #{nombre}, apellidoPaterno = #{apellidoPaterno}, apellidoMaterno = #{apellidoMaterno}, CURP = #{CURP}, email = #{email}, username = #{username}, password = #{password} WHERE idUsuario = #{idUsuario}
